channel.title: +Plastics on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in +Plastics on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Health and environment
item.description: Ocean pollution composition Thermoplastics amount to well over 95% of all plastic found during ocean studies. Polyurethanes, however, account for less than 2% of all waste detected during ocean surveys. Thermoplastics, with their weak inter-strand bonds, produce microplastics.

item.title: PVC
item.description: PVC Oft has heavy metal stabilizers. CPVC PVC + (flexible - plasticizers added, chlorinated) without lead stabilizer Less biofilm potential compared to copper and polyproylene (VE whitepaper): IM Negatives it is brittle and it can’t withstand very high temperatures like copper can Vendors Ashirvad - no mention of being lead-free online. Their head of “Marketing: Demand Generation” said over phone that their raw material does not use Lead.
